snippet: The “Top Gear” hosts had it right when they drove a few dilapidated Lancias a couple of years ago: pretty cars make reliability almost a nonissue.
abstract: The “Top Gear” hosts had it right when they drove a few dilapidated Lancias a couple of years ago: pretty cars make reliability almost a nonissue.

headline.main: Could Pretty Cars Be the Key to Attracting Younger Car Nuts?
